name: StartWebApp
description: Start an Azure Web App, or one of its slot
author: Geek Learning

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to target for starting the Web App

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application

inputs.name: Slot
inputs.label: Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: If provided, will start the specified slot instead of the Web App itself

inputs.name: StartedUrl
inputs.label: Started Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the variable for the started url. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the hosted url of Web App in subsequent tasks like in the PowerShell on Target Machines task.

messages.WebappsuccessfullystartedatUrl0: Web App successfully started at Url: {0}
